hero.name: Lientjie Meiring
hero.subtitle: Architecture Student • Creative Soul • Adventure Seeker

backstory.title: Blueprints of Adventure
backstory.description: Driven by a love for architecture and discovery, I've always seen the world as a place to design, build, and explore. From studying great structures to sketching bold new concepts, I dedicate myself fully to my craft. My adventures take me to cities, cultures, and landscapes that inspire new ideas, and every project is a mission I pursue with determination. I believe great architecture tells stories, connects people, and leaves a lasting mark on the world.
backstory.quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.

items.title: Architecture
items.description: Crafting spaces that inspire and connect, blending form with function to create meaningful experiences.

items.title: Dance
items.description: Expressing movement and emotion through Spanish dance, celebrating rhythm, grace, and artistic performance.

items.title: Nature
items.description: Finding inspiration in wildlife and natural landscapes, embracing adventure and the beauty of the earth.

items.title: Design
items.description: Exploring creative solutions through digital tools, sketching ideas, and bringing visions to life.

items.title: Pet Sitting
items.description: A big heart for animals from small to big. Ready to spoil your animals to see their tails wag

memories.title: Moments That Matter
memories.subtitle: A glimpse into the experiences that have shaped my journey and inspired my path forward

items.title: Wild Companions
items.description: Sharing a moment with one of nature's most majestic creatures, this memory captures my love for animals and the thrill of adventure. Every encounter with wildlife inspires awe, curiosity, and a deeper connection to the natural world.

items.title: Memories of Celebration
items.description: This snapshot from my matric farewell reminds me that while I may know few people, the bonds I have are deep and meaningful. Celebrating milestones with those who truly matter has always been at the heart of my social life, making every moment unforgettable.

items.title: Roots & Relationships
items.description: This moment reflects how deeply connected I am to my family and how much I value those relationships. Through every stage of life, their support, love, and shared laughter have grounded me, reminding me where I come from and what truly matters.

items.title: Purpose-Driven Design
items.description: Every structure should tell a story and serve a meaningful purpose beyond aesthetics.

items.title: Continuous Growth
items.description: Learning is a lifelong journey, and every experience offers valuable lessons.

items.title: Authentic Connections
items.description: Quality over quantity in relationships, cherishing deep bonds with those who matter.

footer.title: The Journey Continues
footer.message: Every day brings new opportunities to learn, create, and grow. I'm excited to see where this path leads and the impact I'll make along the way.
